profile.title: Profayili ya Mushandzisi
profile.mustLogin: U fanele ku nghena (sign in) ku vona swilungiselelo.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Kombisa ya masungulo ni leyi hundzuluxiwaka
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Kombisa yo sungula ni nhundzuluxo swa tlhela swi hlangana
profile.enableReadReceipts: Pfumelela ku vona leswi hlayiweke (read receipts)
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Masekonde ku fika loko swi tima hi woxe
profile.noPrivateKey: Ku hava key ya le xihundleni eka xidzivo lexi ku yi humesa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Veka phasiwede ku seketela (backup) ya wena:
profile.backupDownloaded: Backup yo sireletiwa hi phasiwede yi downloadiwile.
profile.exportFailed: Ku humesiwa ka key ku tsandzekile
profile.importSuccess: Key ya le xihundleni yi nghenisiwile eka xidzivo lexi.
profile.importFailed: Ku tsandzeka ku nghenisa key (phasiwede yi hoxekile kumbe fayili yi onake).
profile.keysRotated: Vukombo byintshwa bya key byi endliwile naswona public key yi layichiwe.
profile.importKey: Nghenisa backup ya key leyi pfariweke
profile.keyDisclaimer: Key ya wena ya le xihundleni a yi tsami xidzivoni lexi. Humesa kopi leyi sirhelelekile hi phasiwede ku yi tlhela u yi tirhisa eka xidzivo xin’wana.
profile.themeFreeNotice: U le ka Free — tirhisa Sun/Moon hi le hansi. Engetela (Upgrade) ku pfula tinhlokomhaka tin’wana ta madyambu.
profile.backupTitle: Tisevheni ta Backup leti Pfariweke & Sync ya Tixidzivo
profile.backupDesc: Endla tibackup leti pfariweke hi phasiwede ta tiki, u tlhela u ti vuyisa eka xidzivo xin’wana ku endla sync.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Hlubuka loko app yi nga le ku nyikeleriweni
profile.notifyOnCopy: ndzi tivisa loko mahungu ya mina ma kopiwile
profile.unfollowFailed: Ku tsandzeka ku tshika ku landzela
profile.followHint: Switori swa vona swi ta humelela eka feed ya Valandzeri loko va tlherisa hi Followers (kumbe Public).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ku tivekile xo hoxeka eka xiphemu lexi.
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Ku rhumerisa mifonelo ni/ku ri tinhlayohlayo
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Rhumerisa mifonelo ni tinhlayohlayo leti nghenaka eka foni kumbe email leyi tiyisiweke. Mifonelo/tinhlayohlayo leti humaka ti nga kombisa nomboro ya wena ya Chatforia.
profile.quietHoursOptional: Tikhora ta ku rhula (hi ku lava)
profile.forwardSaved: Swilungiselelo swa ku rhumerisa swi hlayisiwile
profile.errE164: Nghenisa nomboro ya foni ya ntiyiso ya E.164 (xik. +15551234567).
profile.errEmail: Nghenisa email leyi vonakaka yi ri ya ntiyiso.
profile.errSmsDest: Hlawula ndhawu yi nga tsongo (foni kumbe email).
profile.errQuietHours: Tikhora ta ku rhula ti fanele ku va exikarhi ka 0 na 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Hlawula xindzimana kumbe kamara ku sungula ku bula

status.captionPlaceholder: Avela leswi u nga na swona...
status.filesNote: Ku fika 5 ta tifayela. Ku hela ka 24h hi by defoloto.

premium.heading: Famba ku Premium
premium.description: Pfula swinawana swa matimba & susa ads.

auth.headline: Meseji yo sirheleriwa, ya misava hinkwayo hi nhundzuluxo wo hatlisa
auth.description: Ku pfariwa ku suka emakumu kuya emakumu, nhundzuluxo wa AI, mahungu lama nyamalalaka, ni mifonelo/vidiyo.

feature.encryption: Ku pfariwa ka emakumu kuya emakumu hi by defoloto
feature.translation: Hundzuluxa hi otometa tindzimi to tlula 100
feature.disappearing: Mahungu lama nyamalalaka & ku vona leswi hlayiweke
feature.privacy: Vuxokoxoko ku sungula. Datha ya wena, vukona bya wena.

auth.desktopTip: Eka desikithopo? Skani hi foni ya wena ku kuma app.
auth.subhead: Meseji leyi nga xihundleni, leyi hundzuluxiwaka — hi xitshuketa.
auth.tip: U nga tirhisa Chatforia eka xidzivo xihi na xihi — kumbe dawuniloda app ku kuma ntirhiso lowunene.
auth.scanHint: Skani ku dawuniloda app kumbe u vula eka browser.

footer.doNotSell: U nga ri xitavi datha ya mina

press.title: Vahangalasi
press.contact: Loko u ri na swivutiso swa vahangalasi, tsalela eka press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Loko u ri na swivutiso swa vahangalasi, tihlanganise na hina eka press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia i meseji yo sirheleriwa leyi nga na nhundzuluxo wa xitshuketa na E2E encryption, leyi endlaka leswaku swivulavulelo swa misava swi va xihundla naswona swi olova.
press.assetsText: Malogo, swixanxelo, ni swifaniso swa phepha (swi ta ta ku nga ri khale).

careers.title: Misebetsi
careers.intro: Hi ntlawa lontsongo hi aka meseji ya misava hinkwayo, leyi nga xihundleni. Loko u khathala hi ku pfariwa, ku fikeleriwa, ni UX yo tsakisa, hi ta tsakela ku ku twa.
careers.openRoles: Mintirho leyi pfulekeke: Injiniyaringi (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Phrodikiti, Sekete.
careers.apply: Mahungu yo chela xiboho: Tikumisa hi imeyili na CV/swihlanganisi eka jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Hi ta Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia i meseji ya tindzimi to tala leyi nga xihundleni, hi ku pfariwa ka emakumu kuya emakumu, nhundzuluxo wo hatlisa, ni mifonelo/vidiyo. Nhloso ya hina i ku pfuna vanhu va hlanganisa—hi xihundla, hi vukona, ni le ka tindzimi hinkwato.

values.privacy: Vuxokoxoko ku sungula: Ku pfariwa ka E2E hi by defoloto.
values.access: Ku fikeleriwa ka hinkwavo: Hundzuluxa tindzimi to tlula 100 hi otometa.
values.control: Vulawuri: Mahungu lama nyamalalaka & ku hlayiwa ka mahungu i swa ku tihlawulela.

about.howTitle: Ndlela leyi Chatforia yi tirhaka ha yona
about.howDescription: Mahungu ma pfariwa eka xidzivo xa wena ma nga si famba. Nhundzuluxo, tibackup, ni sync ya tixidzivo swi hlayisiwa ku hunguta leswi sevha ya hina yi nga swi vonaka.

advertise.title: Dyondzetela na Chatforia
advertise.description: Fikelela vatirhisi va meseji hi tindhawu leti languteka kahle, leti tiyisekeke. Hi na tibhanara ta ndhawu yo vona, vusirhelelo bya brand, ni sponsorships. Lava va nga Premium a va voni ads.

adsense.withPubId: Hi tirha hi Google AdSense. Loko u lava ku hi langutela hi Google Ads, tirhisa publisher ID {{pubId}} u kombela managed placement eka tihhawu leti ka hansi. Ku na na sponsorships yo kongoma — tirhisa fomo.
adsense.noPubId: Hi tirha hi Google AdSense. Sponsorships yo kongoma yi kumeka — tirhisa fomo ya le hansi.

advertise.noPlacements: Ku hava tindhawu leti vekiweke. Engetela eka ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Ku nghena ka nkarhi loma-khulu ni ku tshama nkarhi wo leha eka UI ya chat
why.brandSafe: Tifomati leti sirhelelekeke; ku phameriwa hi vutlhari
why.sponsoredMoments: Mimomente ya sponsorship (xik. “Start a Chat” modal) ya kumeka
why.deals: Tidilo to kongoma kumbe hi AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Ndza khensa! Xikombelo xa wena xi le ku tiriweni. Hi ta landzela hi ku hatlisa.
form.successToast: Ndza khensa! Hi ta tihlanganisa na wena hi ku hatlisa.
form.mailtoInfo: Ku pfula email client ya wena ku rhumela xikombelo…
form.messageLabel: Hi byela hi kampeni ya wena
form.messagePlaceholder: Khombo, masiku, KPIs, tindhawu leti u lavaka…

legal.disclaimerStart: Hi ku rhumela, u pfumelelana na

upgrade.title: Engetela
upgrade.subtitle: Hlawula plano leyi faneleke: susa ads hi Plus, kumbe kuma matimba hinkwawo hi Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Subscription yi ta hela
scheduleBanner.body: U ta tlhela u va eka Free hi

plus.title: Plus
plus.cta: Famba u nga ri na Ads

features.ringtones: Maringitone & mimpfumawulo ya mahungu ya munhu
features.priorityUpdates: Tivandzeke ta ntirhisano leti na nkoka

gettingStarted.title: Ku Sungula
gettingStarted.subtitle: U muswa eka Chatforia? Xiletelo lexi xo hatlisa xi ku komba swilo swa nkoka leswaku u kota ku tirhisa hi tin’weti timbirhi.

alert.text: Xiletelo lexi xi ta kula hi leswi hi humesaka swilo leswintshwa. Loko ku ri ni lexi kayivaka, hi byela hi

section1.title: 1) Endla akhawunti ya wena
section1.loginText: hi akhawunti leyi u nga na yona.

section2.title: 2) Sungula ku tumela mahungu
section2.item1: Endla DM kumbe Group u tumela hungu ro sungula.
section2.item2: Tirhisa nhundzuluxo wa xitshuketa ku vulavurisana eka tindzimi to tlula 100.
section2.item3: Linga mahungu lama nyamalalaka ni ku hlayiwa ka mahungu eka Profayili → Vuxokoxoko.

section3.title: 3) Yana emahlweni
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = nga ri na ads, Premium = matimba hinkwawo).
section3.item2Part1: Hlanganisa tixidzivo tin’wana u veka tibackup leti pfariweke eka

account.q: Hi njhani ku endla kumbe ku vuyisa akhawunti?
account.a: Dawuniloda app kumbe tirhisa web, tshikelela “Endla akhawunti”, tiyisisa email/foni. Ku vuyisa, tirhisa “U rivalele phasiwede”.

privacy.q: Mahungu ma pfariwile hi emakumu kuya emakumu?
privacy.a: Ina. Mahungu ni mifonelo swi pfariwile hi emakumu kuya emakumu hi by defoloto. I wena ni muamukeri ntsena lava nga swi hlayaka.

translate.q: Nhundzuluxo wo hatlisa wu tirha njhani?
translate.a: Pfumelela “Auto-translate” eka Swilungiselelo → Xikandza & Ririmi. Hi hundzuluxa eka xidzivo laha swi kotekaka, laha ku nga koteki hi tirhisa API leyi sirhelelekeke hi datha yitsongo.

contact.a: Hi tsalele eka support@chatforia.com. Engetela swifoto-nhlamuselo ni vhezheni ya app.

contact.title: Tivutisa
contact.successMsg: Ndza khensa — ntlawa wa hina wu ta hlamula hi imeyili.
contact.errorSend: A swi rhumeriwanga. Hanya u imeyila support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Polisi leyi yi hlamusela ndlela leyi Chatforia (“hina”, “hina”) yi hlengeletaka, yi tirhisaka, ni ku avela mahungu loko u tirhisa ti-app ni mitirho. Hi aka Chatforia ku hunguta datha leyi hi nga yi vona.

infoWeCollect.title: Mahungu laman’we hlengeletaka
infoWeCollect.account: Mahungu ya akhawunti (xik. email/foni) ku endla ni ku sirhelela akhawunti.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Vundzheni lebyikulu byo pfariwa (mahungu/mifonelo) i E2E; a hi swi hlayi.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Tidiyanginostiki/ntirhiso ku fana na crash logs, muxaka wa xidzivo, kumbe tianalitika leti ringaneke ku antswisa ntirho.

howWeUse.title: Ndlela leyi hi tirhisaka mahungu ha yona
howWeUse.provide: Ku nyika ni ku sirhelela ntirho (auth, ku kuma spam/ku tlhehlela nhlomulo).
howWeUse.improve: Ku antswisa swivumbeko (vukulu bya nhundzuluxo, ku tshembeka).

sharing.title: Ku avelana
sharing.body: A hi xavisi datha ya munhu. Hi nga avelana datha leyitsongo na vatirhi (xik. push, tianalitika) hi swipimelo leswi tindlela ti nga eka tona.

rights.title: Timfanelo ta wena
rights.body: Ku ya hi ndhawu ya wena (xik. GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), u nga komba ku kuma, ku lulamisa, ku susa, kumbe ku tshika mimfungho yin’wana. Tihlanganisa: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ku hlayisiwa ka datha & vuhlayiseki
retention.body: Hi hlayisa ntsena leswi lavekaka ku tirhisa ntirho naswona hi tirhisa vuhlayiseki bya indasitiri. Vundzheni bya E2E a hi swi koti ku byalala.

children.title: Vana
children.body: Chatforia a yi kongomisiwi eka vana va le hansi ka 13 (kumbe hilaha milawu ya ndhawu ya wena yi lavaka hakona).

changes.title: Swiphephana
changes.body: Hi ta veka mpfuxeto laha ni ku pfuxeta “Ku pfuxetiwile ro hetelela”.

intro.body: Hi ku tirhisa Chatforia u pfumelelana na Mimpimanyeto leyi. Loko u nga pfumeli, u nga tirhisi ntirho.

accounts.title: Tikhawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nyika mahungu yo tano hi ntiyiso naswona hlayisa switirhisiwa swa wena swi sirhelelekile.
accounts.itemResponsibility: U na vutihlamuleri bya ntirho eka akhawunti ya wena.

acceptableUse.title: Matirhiselo lama amukeriwaka
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ku hava leswi nga emthethweni, ku xonga, kumbe leswi onhaka; ku hava spam kumbe ku tirhisa ti-boti hi ku biha.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Hi nga yimisa/herisa loko u tlula milawu.

yourContent.title: Vundzheni bya wena
yourContent.body: U humelela timfanelo eka vundzheni bya wena. U hi nyika timfanelo leti lavekaka ku tirhisa ntirho (xik. ku rhumela, ku hlayisa, nhundzuluxo).

disclaimer.title: Tiphemu & vuangameri
disclaimer.body: Ntirho wu nyikiwa “hi ndlela leyi wu nga ha yona” handle ka tiwaranti. Ku fika laha milawu yi pfumeleke, Chatforia a yi na vutihlamuleri bya tihakelo to hlawuleka kumbe ta ku landza.

changes.title: Swiphephana
changes.body: Hi nga pfuxeta mimpimanyeto; ku ya emahlweni hi ku tirhisa endzhaku ka mpfuxeto swi vula ku amukela.

doNotSell.title: U nga ri xitavi kumbe u nga avelani hi Mhaka ya Mina
doNotSell.body: Chatforia a yi xavisi mahungu ya munhu. Vanhu va California va nga rhumela xikombelo hi CPRA hi batani ra le hansi.

cookies.title: Swilungiselelo swa Tikuki
cookies.body: Chatforia yi tirhisa tikuki letintsongo (xik. sesi, vuhlayiseki). A hi tirhisi tikuki ta ma-ads ta va hinkwavo. Lawula tikuki hi swilungiselelo swa browser ya wena.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: A swi kotangi ku layicha xiyimo xa nomboro ya foni.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ku hava nomboro leyi averiweke. Hlawula hi area code ku sungula ku tanda tinhlayohlayo.

startChatModal.title: Sungula mbulavurisano
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Nghenisa vito, vito ra mushandzisi, foni, kumbe email…
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Secha hi vito ra mushandzisi kumbe foni
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Tsalani vito ra mushandzisi kumbe foni kutani mi tshikelela Secha.
startChatModal.pickAtLeastOne: Hlawula un’we ntsena wu nga tsongo.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Tinomboro/email ti ta kumeka endzhaku ka loko u ti hlayisa tanihi vakhonta.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Ku tsandzeka ku sungula na lava hlawuriweke.

sounds.freeNotice: U le ka Free — mimpfumawulo ya Premium yi ta vonaka kambe yi pfariwile. Engetela ku pfula hinkwawo.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Xipfuno lexi xi lava Plano ya Premium.

aiSettings.title: Swilungiselelo swa AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Lawula nhundzuluxo, mhindzulo yo tlharihisa, na ForiaBot auto-responses.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Hundzuluxa mahungu lama nghenaka hi otometa
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Kombisa ya masungulo ndzi ri ni nhundzuluxo
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Rhumela mahungu ya mahetelelo lama amukeriweke (lama basisiweke) eka AI ku hlengeleta mhindzulo yo hatlisa.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Fihla marito yo hombola eka tinhlamuselo ta AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Loko swi ri hi yindlu, tinhlamuselo leti humaka eka AI ti ta va ni marito lama simekiweke
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Pfumelela mhindzulo yo itlhonipha loko ndzi bisi
aiSettings.activeUntilOptional: Yi tirha ku fika (hi ku lava)
aiSettings.saveFailed: Ku tsandzeka ku hlayisa swilungiselelo swa AI
aiSettings.translateTagged: Loko ku ri na @translated kumbe ku khomiwile

accessibilitySettings.title: Ku Fikeleriwa & Switiviso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Swikhetho ku olovisa Chatforia handle ka ku titshelela hi mimpfumawulo.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Yi sungula hi sayizi yo tala. Yisa ehenhla loko u rhandza marito makulu eka swilungiselelo swa ku fikeleriwa.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Switiviso leswi vonakaka eka mahungu & mifonelo
Kombisa tibhanara ni ku phaphata ka title leswaku u nga pfuki u pfumala xiendlo.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vhayibirheita eka mahungu lamantshwa (loko swi seketiwa)
Khomiwa ka xidzivo loko ku ri ni switiviso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Khomekisa skrini hi ku vonakala loko ku ri ni mufone
Ku vonakala hi swiphemu loko ku huwelela mufone.
accessibilitySettings.captionBackground: Ntlhaziho wa le ndzeni wa khapxheni
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Hundzuluxa hi otometa tinotsi ta rito
Engetela transikripxheni eka mahungu ya audio lama amukeriweke.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Switiviso leswi vonakaka eka mahungu & mifonelo
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Kombisa tibhanara ni ku phaphata ka title leswaku u nga pfuki u pfumala xiendlo.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Vhayibirheita eka mahungu lamantshwa (loko swi seketiwa)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Khomi xidzivo loko ku ri ni switiviso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Vonakalisa skrini loko ku ri ni mufone
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Ku vonakala loku kongomaka loko mufone wu huwelela.

privacySection.strictE2EE: Ku pfariwa ka emakumu kuya emakumu ko nonoka
privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Hlayisa ntsena ciphertext eka sevha. Swi tima AI/Translate ni ku languta ka moderation.

linkedDevicesPanel.title: Tixidzivo leti Hlanganisiweke
linkedDevicesPanel.noneFound: A ku kumeki xidzivo lexi hlanganisiweke.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Secha hi alias, vito, vito ra mushandzisi, kumbe foni
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Secha hi foni / vito ra mushandzisi
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Avela link ya memo ku sungula ku bula hi xitshuketa.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: tshama u hlanganile u ri eka ndlela hi Chatforia ya iOS na Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Nhlayo: Mahungu ya wena ma tshama ma hlanganisiwe eka web na mobile.

randomChat.title: Mbulavurisano wa Ndhavuko
randomChat.description: Hlanganisa munhu lontshwa hi xitshuketa. Hi ta ku fambisa ni ku pfula kamara ka nakambe.
randomChat.saveGuard: Mabulavurisano ya munhu-na-munhu ntsena lama nga hlayisiwaka
